title: 383C.392 GRANTS FOR HOT LUNCHES IN CERTAIN RURAL SCHOOLS.
text:
In St. Louis County, the social services board shall award grants each year for St. Louis County School District No. 710 to carry on a nutrition program in the schools and to provide hot lunches for needy school children. The total amount of the grants shall be not more than $20,000. The county shall appropriate the amount needed each year from the general fund to the social services department.
MS 1986 [Repealed, 1988 c 491 s 26]
